ComicInfo.Summary: Imagine the most mind-blowing epic of our times... then double it! Now cram that into a solicitation that compels you to pre-order multiple copies! You have just experienced an Iboga-sized event. You know what we're dealing here: It's cosmic crack for your comic-addled brains! GODLAND ROCKS! ALL OTHER COSMIC SUPERHERO EPICS CAN SUCK IT!
